PromoData.subtitle: Millions have been won from our Must Go Jackpots
PromoData.content:
60,000 Free Spins Must Go

The magic of a Must Go jackpot is knowing that it’s certain to drop!

But this weekend, even if you don’t manage to hit a jackpot, Sky Arcade will give you another chance to win.

That’s because there’s 60,000 Free Spins that must go – and you just never know… one of those Free Spins could land you the Big One. You could call it a Free Spins Silver Lining.

To be in the prize draw for a share of those 60,000 Free Spins, simply:

  • Click the opt in button above
  • Stake £15 on any Jackpot King game
  • Stake £15 on Lucky's Jackpot Tavern OR Sir Jackpotsalot
  • That’s £30 you need to stake in total, between Friday – Sunday
  • Every £30 staked thereafter on any Jackpot King game, Lucky’s Jackpot Tavern or Sir Jackpotsalot earns an additional entry
  • On Monday, the 60,000 Free Spin draw will be made by 7pm and winners will be credited with free spins within 72 hours

The 60,000 Free Spin giveaway is available Friday – Sunday throughout April but remember – you’ll have to opt in and qualify each week. And the good news is that there are no wagering requirements on anything you win with your free spins.

What you need to know

  • Opt in required
  • £30 minimum staking requirements apply. £15 must be staked on Jackpot King Games and £15 must be staked on Sir Jackpotsalot or Lucky’s Jackpot Tavern
  • Game and eligibility restrictions apply
  • Free spin prizes credited on selected Jackpot King Games as per the Prize Template
  • Free spin prizes are valued at 10-20p per spin as per the Prize Template
  • 7 day free spin expiry applies
  • Further T&Cs apply

Lucky’s Jackpot Tavern & Sir Jackpotsalot

Both Lucky’s Jackpot Tavern and Sir Jackpotsalot have three Must Go Jackpots to play for – ranging between £200 and £4,000. If you see the Lucky Rainbow or Treasure Casket then you could be on to a winner! You can stake your £15 on either of these games.

Play Lucky’s Jackpot Tavern here

Play Sir Jackpotsalot here

Jackpot King games

Over £7 Million has been given away from the Jackpot King’s Must Go Jackpots to Sky Arcade Players, and did you know that we have more than 20 Jackpot King games? You can stake your £15 on any Jackpot King game.

Play Jackpot King Games here

What can you win?
Number of free spinsNumber of prizes
Available on selected Jackpot King @ 20p5050
Available on selected Jackpot King @ 20p20100
Available on selected Jackpot King @ 20p10400
Available on Slots O' Gold only @ 10p102500
Available on Slots O' Gold only @ 10p55500

The Selected Jackpot King games will include:

  • Slots O’ Gold
  • Paws of Fury
  • Wish Upon a Jackpot King
  • Super Spinner
  • Deal or No Deal: What’s In Your Box
  • Genie Jackpots

Your Tools, Your Way

Our Responsible Gambling tools help you play safely by sticking to what you can afford. They’re designed for anyone to use – not just for those who feel they need help. Whenever and however you play at Sky Arcade, they can give you extra control and reassurance.

Tools like Deposit Limits and Reality Checks are simple to set up and free to use at any time. Find out more.

steps.one: Click the opt in button above between Friday - Sunday
steps.two: Stake £15 on any Jackpot King game and £15 on Sir Jackpotsalot or Lucky’s Jackpot Tavern (£30 total)
steps.three: The 60,000 Free Spin prize draw will be made by 7pm on Monday!

PromoData.subtitle: Get £10 Cash Back on Sky Arcade Creations slots if you lose £20, on Monday and Wednesdays. Find out more
Why not download our app today, available for Apple and Android devices
PromoData.content:
Experience our adrenaline pumping games straight to your mobile. Whether you’re an Apple or Android user you can enjoy your favourite Sky Arcade games and promotions on the go with our free app.

With great features such as touch ID log in and Apple Pay (IOS only) there’s never been a better time to have the app.

Android Users

Did you know you can download the app straight from the Google Play store? Click here to download.

Apple Users

Download our app for free via the iTunes Store and enjoy on your iPhone and iPad. Click here to download

Here’s some of our favourite games to play on the App!

  • Pan for Gold - Shake to win, as this unique instant win provides a great mobile experience like no other! See if you can scoop the top prize of £25,000 from just a £2 stake. Yee-haw!

  • Genie Jackpots - Ride the magic carpet and see if a big win could be in store for you! With great bonus features including the 3 Wishes Power Spin, Infectious Monkey Wilds and a progressive jackpot the Genie has got all your wishes covered!

  • Rainbow Riches - Play the UK’s number one slot via the Sky Arcade App today and see if you’ve got the luck of the Irish on your side! Can you walk the road to riches and collect the pot of gold waiting for you?

Terms & Conditions
  1. All general Sky Betting and Gaming rules and terms apply.
  2. Sky Betting and Gaming General Promotion Terms apply to this promotion and can be viewed here.

steps.one: Enjoy the thrills of Sky Arcade anywhere, anytime with our app
steps.two: Available for both Apple & Android devices, downloading is easy and free
steps.three: Click here if you’re an Android user to go Google Play store or here if you’re an Apple user to head to the ITunes Store

PromoData.subtitle: Get the most out of your rewards, only at Sky Arcade.
PromoData.content:
FREE SPINS PROMISE

We know that winning some Free Spins is a great feeling, but we don’t want that feeling to stop there. With our Free Spins Promise, you know that any Free Spins you win will have no catches, no wagering requirements, have a minimum value of 10p, and will only be for our most popular games such as Deal or No Deal: The Perfect Play, Slot ‘O Gold, Lion Festival, Super Spinner and more.

So, with Free Spins Promise you can make sure that you get the most out of your rewards, only at Sky Arcade.

Want Some Free Spins?

We’ve got loads of great offers for you to enjoy where you can get Free Spins. Make sure you check your promotional page to find out about the latest rewards and offers.

Exclusive Promotions

Make sure you’re opted in to receive marketing communications, as we often send out exclusive Free Spins promotions by email, text and push message. You can change your preferences in the 'My Account' section on our homepage.

PromoData.subtitle: Things are about to get unexpected.
PromoData.content:
At Sky Arcade, we love the unexpected. And the best thing about the unexpected is never knowing when you’re going to get that winning feeling.

An incredible 20,000 of our players experience the winning feeling every day at Sky Arcade. And we know that some of you like to celebrate your wins in…unexpected ways

Take Nelson Marshall III, otherwise known as The King of the Unexpected. All his life he’s been chasing the sweet anticipation of the unknown, and with Sky Arcade he gets all that and more, “The way I see it, the fun is in the anticipation - the buzz of not knowing if your next spin will be a winner.'

But when the winning feeling hits, boy does he celebrate… unexpectedly, of course. From an impromptu moonwalk to a deep, celebratory bellow of his Alpine Horn, nothing stops him expressing those wins – big or small – in his own, inimitable way.

Want a reason to break out your own unexpected celebration? How about this…On average we pay out £10 million in winnings every day, and congratulate 345 winners every single minute, so why not join them and the King of the Unexpected at the UK’s favourite online casino.

Sky Arcade.

Unexpect More.

PromoData.subtitle: Manage the money and time you spend with us by using our simple tools.
PromoData.content:
Our Responsible Gambling tools help you play safely by sticking to what you can afford.

They’re designed for anyone to use – not just for those who feel they need help. Whenever and however you play at Sky Arcade, they can give you extra control and reassurance. The tools are simple to set up and free to use at any time.

It was Responsible Gambling Week from 1st – 7th November 2018. At Sky Arcade, gambling responsibly isn’t just a week. It’s 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year.

Our Responsible Gambling Tools help you manage to manage the time and money you spend. That way, you always play within your limits and keep gambling fun.

Deposit Limits

Limit the amount you want to deposit, over 24 hours or up to 30 days. If you want to increase your limit it’ll take 24 hours to kick in. Decreases will happen immediately. Deposit Limits set on Sky Arcade will also be applied on Sky Casino, Sky Bingo, Sky Poker and Sky Bet.

Go to our Deposit Limits Tool or take a look at our Deposit Limits video

Gaming Reality Check

Set up a reminder to interrupt your gameplay after 20 minutes or up to 2 hours on our Sky Arcade products.

Find out more about our Gaming Reality Check

Cool Off Periods

Take a break from Sky Arcade, whether it’s one day or 30 days. Once your Cool Off Period is over, you’ll simply be able to re-access our site and app. There’s no need to contact us.

Self-Exclusion

If you want to stop completely, you can block your account from all our products for six months or up to five years.

Gambling Support

If you’d like to talk about any of the tools, please give our Customer Care Team a call on 0330 024 4777.

If you’re concerned in any way about your gambling, you can get free, independent and non-judgmental advice at BeGambleAware.org.

You can also call the National Gambling Helpline, for free, on 0808 8020 133.

Information and contact details of charities who specialise in problem gambling can be found through the websites below.

  • https://www.begambleaware.org
  • https://www.gamcare.org.uk
  • https://www.gamblingtherapy.org
  • https://www.gordonmoody.org.uk

Now, have a seriously good time on us with your 50 free spins!

PromoData.displayName: Want more chances to get that winning feeling?
PromoData.subtitle: Check out our social media pages.
PromoData.content:
Follow us on Facebook and Twitter to take part in our weekly competitions, Facebook Lives and more!

Reel Monday:

A weekly competition whereby we giveaway 10 FREE £25 Sky Arcade bonuses.

What you need to know:
  • Every Monday from 9.30am-11.59pm.
  • 10 x £25 Sky Arcade bonuses up for grabs.
  • Simply comment with #ReelMonday to enter.
Terms and Conditions
  1. Followers of any Sky Betting and Gaming social media page must be 18+. This includes Sky Poker, Sky Bingo, Sky Arcade, Sky Casino and Sky Bet.
  2. Sky Arcade reserve the right to cancel or discontinue any social media promotion at short notice and without notification.
  3. Winners for any promotion held on social media will have their account audited before any prize is awarded. Self-excluded accounts are not eligible to receive any prizes.
  4. All general Sky Betting and Gaming rules and terms apply.
  5. Sky Betting and Gaming General Promotion Terms apply to this promotion and can be viewed here.
Reel Monday Terms and Conditions
  1. To qualify for this promotion you must be aged 18 years and over and be fully registered as a customer of Sky Betting & Gaming. Open to Sky Arcade customers who are eligible to receive promotions and bonuses only.
  2. Customers will be able to enter this promotion on our Facebook page from 09:30:00 until 23:59:59 on Mondays.
  3. This promotion will run for the foreseeable future, every Monday until terminated by Sky Betting and Gaming.
  4. Customers have the chance to win one of ten £25 Sky Arcade bonuses. Bonuses are non-withdrawable and carry a 1x wagering requirement. There is no cash alternative and the bonus cannot be transferred to another player.
  5. Entries into the prize draw to win one of the £25 Sky Arcade bonuses shall be earned by commenting on the competition post with #ReelMonday
  6. There is only one entry permitted per customer.
  7. Customers can enter via Facebook only.
  8. Winners will be chosen at random from all eligible entries and announced on Tuesdays by 17:00:00.
  9. Winners must contact us via private message on our Sky Arcade Facebook page confirming User ID, Full Name, Date of Birth and Post Code within three days of the winners being announced to receive the bonus. Failing to contact Sky Arcade via Facebook or contacting us after the three day time limit will result in the winner forfeiting the prize.
  10. Bonuses will be credited within 72 hours of details being confirmed.
  11. Bonuses will expire 14 days after crediting if not used or if Wagering is not met.
  12. No entries on behalf of 3rd parties will be accepted.
  13. No entries from joint Facebook accounts accepted.
  14. Only a Customer’s first entry will qualify, all subsequent entries will be disregarded.
  15. Customers can only earn one prize as part of each weekly draw.
  16. Sky Arcade have the sole right, at their reasonable discretion, to alter, amend or terminate this promotion at short notice and without notification, if reasonably necessary to do so.
  17. Customers previously excluded from Sky Betting and gaming offers or bonuses will not be eligible to receive any bonuses as part of this promotion.
  18. Customers who have self-excluded from Sky Arcade, Sky Bingo or Sky Casino will not be eligible to receive any bonuses as part of this promotion.
  19. By commenting on the Facebook post, you acknowledge and agree that you are accepting the offer in accordance with these terms and conditions.
  20. All general Sky Betting and Gaming rules and terms apply.
  21. All Sky Betting and Gaming General Promotional Terms and Conditions apply and can be viewed here.

PromoData.displayName: 100,000 Free Spins up for grabs every day!
PromoData.subtitle: Opt in & spin for your daily FREE chance to win!
PromoData.content:
100,000 FREE SPINS? EVERY DAY? FOR FREE?

How do you fancy a chance at winning a share of 100,000 Free Spins, as well as other great prizes, for FREE, every day?

Prize Machine is that chance, and you can play for free every day from 12pm at Sky Arcade. As well as 100,000 Free Spins, we’ll also have cash, sports bets and loads more to be won.

And if you are a winner of some Free Spins, you can rest assured that they’re backed by our Free Spins Promise. Meaning, no wagering requirements, what you win from any free spins is yours.

Keep an eye out for Surge Days. On these special days, we are increasing the number of prizes up for grabs meaning we are creating even more winners!

So, what are you waiting for? Take your completely free, no catches play Prize Machine from 12pm every day and see what you could win.

What you need to know:

  • Opt in required
  • Customers can claim one spin on either Prize Machine or MEGA Prize Machine per day
  • Standard prize template will commence the day after opt in
  • Bonuses are non-withdrawable, any winnings credited as cash
  • Some prizes involve a staking requirement
  • Prize expiry period may apply
  • Eligibility restrictions
  • Further T&Cs apply

Have you experienced our MEGA Prize Machine? Unlock more valuable prizes, including the chance to win up to £250 in cash. Simply stake £10 on ANY Sky Arcade game to unlock your MEGA spin the following day.

With our Free Spins Promise, you know that any Free Spins you win will have no wagering requirements, have a minimum value of 10p, and will only be for our most popular games.

Don’t forget to watch out for our surge days. On these days, the Prize Machine will be loaded with even more prizes to be won. You never know when they could appear so make sure you check your emails regularly! Plus, there are extra special SUPER SURGE days, whereby all opted in plays are guaranteed a winning prize.

Need help? Read our Prize Machine frequently asked questions here.

Your Tools, Your Way

Our Responsible Gambling tools help you play safely by sticking to what you can afford. They’re designed for anyone to use – not just for those who feel they need help. Whenever and however you play at Sky Arcade, they can give you extra control and reassurance.

Tools like Deposit Limits and Reality Checks are simple to set up and free to use at any time. Find out more.

steps.one: DAILY FREE CHANCE: Opt in and every day from 12pm, you can spin the Prize Machine for a FREE chance to win a range of prizes!
steps.two: WANT BIGGER PRIZES: Stake £10 on any Sky Arcade game to unlock our MEGA Prize Machine the following day. This gives you a better chance to win and bigger prizes to be won, including up to £250 cash!
steps.three: SURGE ALERT: On selected days we will be increasing the number of prizes to be won, which means more chances to win!

PromoData.subtitle: You could win Jeff's £250,000!
PromoData.content:
Play for free here!

He’s given away over £1.5m already this season!

This season it's personal.

Jeff has given away over £10m on Super 6 across the years and he claims he is flat broke, but once again, he has been forced by Super 6 to put a huge cash jackpot on the line!

You can also be in with a chance of winning additional cash prizes if you challenge and beat Jeff’s score each round.

Predict 6 correct scores for the chance to win. Don't forget, you can create a league to compete against friends and family. New for the 18/19 season: add a pundit to your league and see how you and your mates fare against the experts.

Play for free here!

steps.one: LOGIN - You can use your existing Sky Arcade login details to play Super 6.
steps.two: MAKE YOUR PREDICTIONS – Predict the scores from the 6 matches in the current round.
steps.three: GO HEAD TO HEAD WITH JEFF – After making your predictions opt in to Head to Head for another chance to win Jeff’s cash.

PromoData.subtitle: With over 10 games, including Diamond Mine
PromoData.content:
Diamond Mine

Go digging for gold and free spins in the Wild West.

Diamond Mine is a 6-reel slot featuring MEGAWAYS™, cascading symbols and an Unlimited Win Multiplier during Free Spins, which increases after every win.

Look out for the TNT Symbol, which will explode to reveal the same random symbol for even more ways to find your gold!

What is a Megaways slot?

Expanding reels where the symbol height on each reel varies with each spin, resulting in a change to paylines and therefore the win potential.

You have up to 117,649 ways to win.

Megaways games have the potential to give huge winning combinations – not to mention added multipliers and reel modifiers.

With over 10 games to choose from, including Slots O’ Gold, Lightning Strike, Genie Jackpots and much more – there’s plenty of ways to experience the Megaways thrill at Sky Arcade.

Megaways Slots

Your Tools, Your Way

Our Responsible Gambling tools help you play safely by sticking to what you can afford. They’re designed for anyone to use – not just for those who feel they need help. Whenever and however you play at Sky Arcade, they can give you extra control and reassurance.

Tools like Deposit Limits and Reality Checks are simple to set up and free to use at any time. Find out more.
